mapper.insert: INSERT INTO private_ground ( host_id, status, title, description, type, unit_amount, access_vehicle, space_size, theme, created_at, created_by, deleted ) VALUES ( #{hostId}, #{status}, #{title}, #{description}, #{type}, #{unitAmount}, #{accessVehicle}, #{spaceSize}, #{theme}, now(), #{createdBy}, #{deleted} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM private_ground WHERE host_id = #{hostId} AND deleted = false
SELECT * FROM private_ground WHERE pg_id = #{pgId} AND deleted = false AND status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT * FROM private_ground ORDER BY pg_id DESC
